description: Beam Flex Template for Parquet to BigQuery
name: Parquet-to-BigQuery

parameters.name: project
parameters.label: Project ID
parameters.helpText: The project id where magic happens.

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.label: GCS Bucket Name
parameters.helpText: The bucket name where the files are stored.

parameters.name: parquetpath
parameters.label: Parquet Files Path
parameters.helpText: The file path for the new parquet files.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.label: BigQuery Dataset
parameters.helpText: The BigQuery dataset where data is gonna be stored.

parameters.name: table
parameters.label: BigQuery Table
parameters.helpText: The BigQuery table to store the data.
